 3:     namespace UserApp\Exceptions;
 4: 
 5:     class ServiceException extends UserAppException {
 6:         private $_error_code;
 7:         
 8:         public function __construct($error_code, $message){
 9:             $this->_error_code = $error_code;
10:             parent::__construct($message);
11:         }
12: 
13:         public function getErrorCode(){

15:         }
16:     }
